title: Yuck! Book

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• The switch user can join in by using their switches to fill in the gaps of repeated lines in the book Yuck!
• Record "yuck" on one switch and "yum" on the other.
• Read the story to the switch user and on the first repeated line, press their switches to show them how they can fill in the gaps of the repeated line e.g. "a wriggly worm, tugged out of the lawn? That's not our baby's dinner!" (Yuck)
• Continue the story and pause on the repeated lines for the switch user to fill in the gap.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to say the repeated line in the book
